SEARCH
Package database

Class Database

java.lang.Object
database.Database
public class Database extends Object
Represents a simple database system that manages tables and their columns and rows.

      Returns:

    • deleteTable

      public void deleteTable(String tableName)
      Deletes a table from the database.
      Parameters:
      tableName - the name of the table to delete.

    • updateTableName

      public void updateTableName(String oldName, String newName)
      Renames an existing table in the database.
      Parameters:
      oldName - the current name of the table.
      newName - the new name for the table.
      Throws:
      Error - if the old table name does not exist or the new name already exists.

    • isValidTableName

      public boolean isValidTableName(String tableName)
      Checks if a table name is valid.
      Parameters:
      tableName - the name of the table to check.
      Returns:
      true if the table name is valid, false otherwise.

    • isValidColumnName

      public boolean isValidColumnName(String tableName, String columnName)
      Checks if a column name is valid for a table.
      Parameters:
      tableName - the name of the table to check.
      columnName - the name of the column to check.
      Returns:
      true if the column name is valid, false otherwise.

      public boolean columnAllowBlank(String tableName, String columnName)
      Checks if a column allows blank values.
      Parameters:
      tableName - the name of the table to check.
      columnName - the name of the column to check.
      Returns:
      true if the column allows blank values, false otherwise.

      Parameters:
      tableName - the name of the table to add the column to.
      Throws:
      Error - if the table does not exist.

      Parameters:

      index - the index of the row to delete.
      Throws:
      Error - if the table does not exist.

      Deletes a column from a table.
      Parameters:
      tableName - the name of the table to delete the column from.
      columnName - the name of the column to delete.
      Throws:
      Error - if the table does not exist.

    • updateCell

      public void updateCell(String tableName, String columnName, int rowIndex, String value)
      Edits a cell in a table.
      Parameters:
      tableName - the name of the table containing the cell.
      columnName - the name of the column containing the cell.
      rowIndex - the index of the row containing the cell.
      value - the new value for the cell.

    • getCell

      public String getCell(String tableName, String columnName, int rowIndex)
      Retrieves the value of a cell in a table.
      Parameters:
      tableName - the name of the table containing the cell.
      columnName - the name of the column containing the cell.
      rowIndex - the index of the row containing the cell.
      Returns:
      the value of the cell.

      Parameters:

      Returns:

      tableName - the name of the table containing the column.
      columnName - the name of the column to retrieve the default value of.
